summary: This document contains a series of internal Bureau of Prisons email updates regarding the suicide watch and psychological observation status of inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in July 2019, just weeks before his death. It shows he was moved between suicide watch, psychological observation, and the SHU.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's status was actively being managed between Suicide Watch and Psychological Observation in July 2019.
On July 10, 2019, Epstein was moved from Psychological Observation to the Special Housing Unit (SHU).
A forensic psychologist named Gebremariam was involved in the psychological observation process.
These internal status updates occurred weeks before Epstein's death in August 2019.
The communications are official, sensitive BOP correspondence regarding a high-profile inmate.
